CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TODAY() < (PhysicalExamDue__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueDistemper__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueHepatitis__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueParainfluenza__c), TODAY() < (VaccineDueParvovirus__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueRabies__c ) ), 'Good', 'Expired' & IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif", '*') )
CustomField.label: Vaccination Expiry Date Status
